info.name: Vellenum API
info.description: Postman collection for Vellenum API - import this to test endpoints. Set {{base_url}} (e.g. http://localhost:8000) and {{token}} for protected routes.

request.description: Generic seller registration containing common user fields. Use category-specific registrations below for prefilled seller-category fields.
Restaurant-specific registration (seller_category_id=1). Required user fields + restaurant fields. File fields represented as placeholder IDs or filenames.
Login and receive access token. Token goes into Authorization header as: Bearer {{token}}
Request an OTP for verification or password reset (dev returns OTP in response).
Revoke current user's token (requires Authorization header).
Get featured products grouped by seller category. Optional pagination handled by backend.
Query params: product_category_id, min_price, max_price, search, sort_by (title|price|created_at), sort_order (asc|desc), page.
Search and filter products. Pagination supported.
Get details and related products for product id = 1.
Upload product with multiple images. Use form-data files for `images` fields. Optionally supply `image_file_id` to reference existing file.
Update product by id. If `images` provided, old images are deleted.
Downloads file from storage if it exists on disk. Will return file binary.
